programme.title: Pearl Harbour, Dick Cheney and Saddam Hussein
programme.short_synopsis: Does the power to take America to war belong to President Bush or the US Congress?
programme.medium_synopsis: The attack on Pearl Harbour, Congress and President Bush's conflict over the power to take the country to war, and Dick Cheney's objections to sanctions against Saddam Hussein.
